# Helper Instructions

This file provides helper instructions for OpenCode projects.

## Purpose

Generic instruction file that can be referenced in `opencode.json` via the `instructions` array.

## Best Practices

- Keep instructions clear and concise
- Reference external documentation when needed
- Update regularly based on team feedback

## Example Usage

In your `opencode.json`:

```json
{
  "instructions": [".opencode/opencode-test-package/helper.md"]
}
```
